name: Aasimar
description: Beings with celestial heritage, guided by a divine spark.

name: Dragonborn
description: Proud draconic warriors bearing the blood of dragons.

name: Dwarf
description: Stout and enduring denizens of mountain and stone.

name: Elf
description: Graceful and long-lived folk of fey ancestry.

name: Gnome
description: Small and clever, masters of illusion and invention.

name: Goliath
description: Mountain giants thriving in high altitudes.

name: Halfling
description: Cheerful and nimble folk with a streak of good fortune.

name: Human
description: Versatile and ambitious, they adapt to any challenge.

name: Orc
description: Fierce warriors known for their strength and tenacity.

name: Tiefling
description: Descendants of fiends, marked by infernal legacy.
